greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: R(n,k) = 2^(composite(n)-composite(k)) mod composite(n), 1<=k<=n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1035
mathematica: Composite[m_] := FixedPoint[m + PrimePi[#] + 1 &, m + PrimePi[m] + 1]; a[n_, k_] := Mod[2^(Composite[n] - Composite[k]), Composite[n]]; Table[a[n, k], {n, 1, 15}, {k, 1, n}]; Flatten[%] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 24 2016 *)
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Dec 12 2010
ext: Terms corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 15 2010
